scenes.name: swim to cave
scenes.description:
You notice a small cave tunnel underneath the water with light shining through from the other side. Do you dare to swim through? 
 - continue 
 - turn back

scenes.name: emerging
scenes.description:
You swim through the tunnel, claustrophobic at its tiny size. 
Just as you almost run out of air, you burst to the surface inside of a small cavern and gasp for air. 
 - continue
